post.body: so is there flooding in madras
- i am stunned @ the audacity n the lack of control our gov has on the security of our country..but stll ur comments r v cynical
Off to c d Argntinian side of the Iguassu Falls 2day after d Brzilian side yday.May put the whole debate to rest about which side is better
Iguassa Falls in the border of brazil and argentina kicks ass....niagara is really small fish in comparison...
Had the Caipirinha - the Brazilian national drink and cocktail-made from Cacha√ßa...was nice....but pretty strong....
Day 3 Rio despite the rain was pretty good...and yeah did pretty normal touristy things
2nd and 3rd of the Riop trip washed out....this is the 3rd vacation this year effected this way by aqua...
Blinding hot day on the beach in Copacabana....
damn do these people in rio never sleep...
Rio rocks....Ipanema and Leblon areas are really nice...
d-day d-day...antarctica here i come...
All packed and prepared...what am i missing...what am i missing....im sure it is something important....
Not sure if anyone will have a job next year...let's live for the moment...
Leaving for South American tomorrow and then onward to the Antarctic trip on next week..after a year of planning...really need it this year.
i'll be in rio, buenos aires, ushuaia, lima and cusco over the next 3 weeks. if there is anyone from that necks of the woods, pls contact me
Phoenix,az.Is there anything at all to do here besides the cing the humongous cacti.the city planners think it gives the city some character
Another thing cnn's so called security experts care about is if india is going down the tube as well like pakistan n afghanistan....
Wtchng cnn's roadblocked coverage of the situation in Bombay in grand canyon..all cnn cares about is if americans were targetted
Raining and white out conditions in SEDONA !!! of all places.....
In Ushuaia the southernmost city in the world...off to Antarctica tomorrow....
As far as I am concerned there is no point debating which side of Iguassu Falls are better. Both r breathtaking..
